findings.title: L01. Missing Events
findings.description: Events for critical state changes should be emitted for tracking things off-chain.

findings.title: L02. Unused Error
findings.description: Unused errors should be removed from the contract. Unused errors are allowed in Scilla and do not pose a direct security issue. It is best practice to avoid them as they decrease readability.

findings.title: X tokens extended to 20 blocks instead of intended 10-block limit
findings.description: The burn time for X tokens is extended to 20 blocks instead of the intended 10-block limit.

findings.title: Minimal burn cancel duration is not set-up
findings.description: In case of zero value functionality of cancels would not work.
